sentences.english: Oh, I am not scared of anyone, I die for you.

sentences.english: No, I'm afraid I need a non-smoking room.

sentences.english: He hurried on, lest he should drop out in the forced match.

sentences.english: She scared beaten by the snake, so she dare not work though the brushwood.

sentences.english: The same lethargy, I am afraid, characterizes the use of our faculties and senses.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们在运用我们所有五民时生怕也同样是冷漠的。

sentences.english: The operation is a delicate one. I'm afraid I could perform it alone.

sentences.english: Joe stopped Becky lest (for fear that) she (should) reveal the whole plan.
sentences.chinese: 乔不让贝基说下去，生怕她泄露了整个计划。

sentences.english: She opened the door gently so as not to rub against the wet paint.
sentences.chinese: 她小心翼翼地把门打开，生怕蹭上未干的油漆。

sentences.english: For the word by Jin, write to worry, fear pear rain.

sentences.english: Blade regiment several times, but nearly will also save himself falling.

sentences.english: I slept with all my money under my pillow for fear of thieves.
sentences.chinese: 我睡觉时把钱放在枕头下，生怕贼偷了去。

sentences.english: Lest one touch of this heart convey its grief.
sentences.chinese: 生怕心触及，哀伤现无遗。

sentences.english: I opened my eyes as large as possible, fearing to lose anything.
sentences.chinese: 我尽量睁大眼睛，生怕会漏掉什么。

sentences.english: He climbed the stairs quietly, not wanting to awaken any of his fellow numeraries.
sentences.chinese: 他轻声的上楼，生怕吵醒了他的同伙。

sentences.english: I quickly turned to fear, he saw me laughing.
sentences.chinese: 我急忙转过脸来，生怕被他看到我藏不住的笑。
